name: Sakura Fantasy
description: The new visual novel from the makers of Sakura Spirit and Sakura Angels. Sakura Fantasy Chapter 1 is an exciting visual novel fantasy adventure where you decide the development of the story by the choices you make. It is the tale of an aspiring female protagonist who wishes to aim to become a knight.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 720 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: It has an uncensored nudity patch. 'nuff said.

Alright, I would give this game a 9/10 Pros: Good Story Great Artwork Choices Affect the story Female Protag Three different girls you can hook up with Lots of Nudity scenes YURI Makeout scenes You get some pictures from the gallery just by starting up the game Voices Cons: Some Spelling errors Parts of the story tend to be boring The Music is OK Only gives you around 4 hours /But you can always go back and take a different route/ -- If you like reading the story instead of just buying it for the nudity, then this is a good game for you. It's also my favorite Sakura game. I enjoyed the story, and I can't wait for the next chapter~

After playing the previous 2 with this being the third one that I played/read through. I have to say that is has more of a plot compared to the others, you'll also get to make a lot of choices now which is good thing. Really starting to enjoy it now especially since the plot is much bigger this time than just bewbs and the soundtrack is also very well done. Though my favorite in the series is still Sakura Spirit, mainly for nostalgic purposes and the charming characters. This series might actually be as good as it or maybe even better. It's a little weird how they actually reused some of the character models from Sakura Angels but they made quite a few adjustments so that you will be able to think of them as entirely new characters. Definitely recommend this if you are a big fan of the franchise as I am :) I'm currently waiting for Chpater 2 to be released which should be sometime in July as announced by Winged Cloud. There are also rumors that the next 2 games will be called Sakura Dungeon and Sakura Beach. So there is a lot to look forward to this year from Winged Cloud.

It was a mistake buying this game Finished the whole game in less than an hour The story progression is somewhat weird and the storyline itself is just bad  Simply a bad attempt of a half-♥♥♥♥♥ company in making, what they called a 'visual novel', by just simply putting a bunch of pictures of underclothed girls     1/10 a waste of time    I just put those up so my friends won't think that I'm weird    I ship Keira-chan and Raelin-chan Still waiting for chapter 2 Winged Cloud pls  10/10
Had a great story line, amazing pictures, and time consuming storyline that holds the readers attention.
A fun loving game fit for the whole family.
It was a gift, I swear!
Best Sakura Ever Made , Yuri of the Year
this game gave me my name ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

I bought sakura spirit because of the cute girls, but got bummed that it didn't have voice, bought this one hoping there would be voice this time. Still no voice, bummed again, but I gave it a chance and the story was actually quite engaging. Couldn't stop reading, the cute girls is a huuuge plus :D  The empress is probably one of the most beautiful anime girls I've seen... elegant too :)   10/10 in my book, can't wait for chapter 2 !  with the nudity patch... it become 20/10 x)
Came...                                               ...buckets

I will say this upfront. I am not very well-versed when it comes to visual novels. Not particularly a fan of them, either. Largely because I generally don't consider them to be games. Look at Skyrim, Devil May Cry, or Metal Gear Solid. All of those are games. Because you take active role in what happens in those games. Visual novels, on the other hand, are products where you generally read a wall of text with characters on screen making facial expressions to match their emotions. I prefer my games where I do something other than just sit and read. If I wanted to read, I would read a book. But that's a different topic. Right now, I am going to review Sakura Fantasy Chapter 1.  Sakura Fantasy is a game that draws you in with the promise of anime girls in various states of undress and sexuality. And for the first few hours, it seems to be just that. Our protagonist heroine, Raelin, is a knight-to-be, born with the ability of far-seeing that allows her to seeing into places that is not in her line of sight hence the name. Which everyone assumes she uses to spy on other people in their private moments. And despite her denial when asked directly, she actually does.   But is it truly a boob/yuri-fest and nothing more? It is true that those exist. But it's not all that this novel is about. It delivers a compelling story with an interesting setting. If you can look past the nudity, and are able to ignore that 'itchy' feeling you get inbetween your legs.  I don't like being that person but... If you are a fan of anime, like anime girls and/or possess an artistic appreciation for the female body, there is a good chance you will like this game. If you don't like the female physique being treated as a mere object, dislike anime or nudity in any form of media, it's more than likely that you will hate this 'game'. This is a 'game' targeted for open-minded individuals who have no qualms about nudity in their stories/games.

Despite getting hate from my friends from owning this game, I really enjoyed it.  The story was nice, the 'plot' was good and there were more choices in this VN as opposed to Sakura Angles.  I'd really like to see the second part of this story.  Nice job!

This Sakura game has the best story out of all the Sakura games I've played so far. Hands down. I think the fact that this is the first game in a longer series made the story much better. The first half of this game is all about introducing us to the characters, getting to known them and their backstories a bit, and just getting a general feel for the setting. The second half is where things get actiony and they tease ever so slightly at what is to come in later installments. The writing in this is so much better than previous games it's astounding. This might be my favorite Sakura game so far, either this or Swim Club cause that one is super great too. The art is perfect as always, Wanaca never disappoints. I'm excited for Chapter 2 and hope the wait for it won't be too long.  I also really liked that the MC is female for a change. It gives the game a much different feel than the other Sakura games. The MC also has a fun little power that lets her basically project her mind and become the best peeping tom ever. Hilarity follows.  Update: Winged Cloud just released an uncensored patch like the one for Swim Club.

(My opionon.) This is the best game out of the Sakura series so far. They have good music and a lot of Choices (but most of the choices doesn`t really effect the story at all.)-and they also have a decent story line.   (What for improvments do i want to see.) For me are the choices a really big deal with games like this, so i want to see more improvements for the choices that you can make as the protagonist, for the next Sakura games.
I was not even 5 minutes in.  I had to choose whether to wear panties or not.

As a diligent puruser of anime babes... I give this game two cheeto-dust encrusted thumbs up. Of all the Sakura series games I've played, this is easily the best. The story actually has some substance (Nothing incredible, but what are you expecting?) and the characters are pretty likeable and as varied as you could hope for. (Also, as opposed to the first Sakura Spirit, you actually have some choices to make in game.)   Go ahead and check it out! For the price, it's a cute little VN.
I will just say this once. My favorite Sakura Game so far.   Sakura Fantasy Chapter 1
Very Great Story coming from SAkura Fantasy Alot of Dialogue options :D   Enjoyable Characters and funny moments
The 'Plot' is Really good in this game
It's a good thing the game has the capacity for 100+ save files, 'cause I save every time a choice comes up...

A very different approach than the other installments. The protagonist that the player plays as is a girl which develops feelings for the other girls. I'm not a hater for that kind of stuff but I do think it's a nice change up to keep the series not so repetitive.

Sakura Fantasy is quite different from Sakura Angels and Sakura Spirit, because you are playing as a girl and you actually see her on the scene beside other characters. Another difference are decision times, which are much more frequent, which gives you a bit more freedom. It has maybe too much fan service, which sometimes ruin the moment, yet it kind of intensifies the bond between those characters. The story itself will probably really start in chapter 2, since this is kind of foreplay. :P  Still can´t wait for another part :3 Overall rating for me would be 8,5/10
i like this, i want to watch chapter 2 also
Now Im a little drunk wwhile typing this but I gotta say the chocolate bathtub was a pretty good scene 1/10
What to do if I hate reading?
Just the right amount of light hearted, sweet story telling and fan service. My bonerd wept.

Longer than most Sakura novels to be sure and a damn sight more bold! Only downside I could find is the short messages for text... I mean ya get this big text box and u only get 1/15th of the box filled with text! Urgh thats gunna give me so many eye problems. Anyway, when this novel wants to deliver atmosphere it does so pretty well, there is a certain character that gives off an air all her own, you'll know who this being of mystique is when you meet her and you'll see what I mean. I personally cannot WAIT for this to be finished, all the chapters and all! at times there are TRUE multiple choice paths, but overall either choice just gives the SET path a different coating. The points of TRUE multiple choice are completly worth the effort to go back to and see. A good little read, (if annoyingly laid out). oh and I forgot to mention, for those who KNOW The sakura series of visual novels will know that this stuff is fairly echi. well it takes the echi of the past and cranks it up to 11 here! Its more bold than Ive ever seen from a sakura novel! And the sad moments of the story, Oh man do they hit hard, THE FEELS MAN! I have to admit the fact you SEE your character you are and that its female threw me for a loop, I spent the first 3 minutes thinking: 'who is this person on my screen hanging around like that?' Wasnt prepared for that. Nice surprise.
11/10 Invaded Empress' dreams and made out with her.
WHERE'S CHAPTER TWO YOU TURDS
Just the right amount of light hearted, sweet story telling and fan service. My bonerd wept.

Aside from the obvious nude pictures, the game has a great story that is going somewhere. Unfortunatly, the ending to chapter 1 was a little bit of a surprise becuase I was reading for a bout 3 hours and the chapter ended. Other than that, this is a very good visual novel, but for the price that I paid for it, I would have expected it to be a little longer of a first chapter. None the less, I think that this is a great visual novel for it's ablility to let you make your own descisions and to have a role in the story. I can't wait for chapter 2!
Having to choose who to have lesbian sex with definitely rivals any of the choices I ever made in Mass Effect.
This story is quite nice. I rather enjoyed it.
-Hold down 'SPACE' -Click once in the middle of the screen afther 5 minutes -Wait 1 minute for the credis -Go to the gallery -Open all the pictures, press F12 -Refound
Never have I ever pressed f12 so many times before.

HAHAHAHA oh my god. I guess this is another case of a game being so full of anime stereotypes and predictable cheese that it's actually enjoyable. I for one enjoy cheese when it's served with abnormally large boobs, basically-tentacle fetish scenes and icky chocolate baths. Ah, Sakura games. You laugh but you're probably going to end up playing their other games anyways. Can never go wrong with yuri.  69/10 will play chapter 2.

Loved it and a good read.  Music: 8/10 Visual / Artwork: 9/10  Pros: 1. An interesting read about a fantasy world 2. mostly yuri as the Main Character (female) intereacts with other female characters 3. Loads of fan-service 4. R18 contents (if patched.) 5. Intriguing plot  50/50 1. Choices sometimes counter other choices 2. Character development is very straightforward  Cons: 1. Feels very briefed. story has its foundation but feels a little too briefed
With the other ones they done, this is my favourite.   Worth more then asking price. If you like this stuff. Otherwise worth getting because its good..   11/10
Oh i need chapter 2 the characters are loveable cute and so much fun...the story really sucked me in.
I did not expect to like this game as much as I did.

Winged Cloud really stepped up their game with this Visual Novel, compared to previous ones. The amount of yuri fanservice is staggering, the art is beautiful and the story is actually more interesting than in earlier Sakura games.  The only issue I have with it is that a few points of the story could have been a bit shorter, they felt drawn out a bit too much.  Overall I recomend it to anyone who likes yuri VNs, this one's for you. 9/10

It's a Sakura game. If you like Sakura games you'll probably like this one. So far this is the best I've personally plaid. Buy it on the cheap, enjoy the not completely terribly written story, and move on.

I don't like paying anything for games that are that short in storyline and have little to no consequence or benefits to decisions that you make.  Doesn't show nudity, so don't get your hopes up. Google the added content if you want that. I prefer without it anyway as those nudity shots are nothing that I couldn't have put in myself (via imagination or patching) (same artwork, just added in nipples kind of thing).  Replay-ability is out the window. I have no intention of ever playing this again. Story wasn't that good to make me remember much of it a few weeks later.  Seems like it takes just long enough to complete to avoid it being returned according to Steam's return policy.
its fine,  sadly no part 2
Needed something to have sex with...... now my ♥♥♥♥ is in a toaster and is extra crispy. -10/10 would not play again near a toaster.
